attributes.action: Prevent private companies from issuing unfair extortinate parking charge notices
attributes.additional_details: The government is allowing these companies to hide behind flaws (loopholes) in law and penalise road users for minor issues and also charge ridiculess amounts of money in british courts. Its time the government outlaw these companies and protect motorists from these scammers.
attributes.background: Make it illegal for private companies to issue parking charge notices against motorists for example stopping for only seconds at a time or for unknowingly parking for a longer period of time permitted in a supermarket car park

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what specific changes you would like to see to the laws which regulate private parking companies.
